    Tracing the likelihood calculation of a Gaussian model

    Venelin Mitov

    2019-07-10

    Source: vignettes/PCMTracePruning.Rmd
    PCMTracePruning.Rmd
    X <- cbind(
  c(0.3, NaN, 1.4), 
  c(0.1, NaN, NA), 
  c(0.2, NaN, 1.2), 
  c(NA, 0.2, 0.2), 
  c(NA, 1.2, 0.4))

colnames(X) <- as.character(1:5)
    treeText <- "((5:0.8,4:1.8)7:1.5,(((3:0.8,2:1.6)6:0.7)8:0.6,1:2.6)9:0.9)0;"
tree <- PCMTree(read.tree(text = treeText))

PCMTreeSetPartRegimes(tree, part.regime = c(`6`=2), setPartition = TRUE, inplace = TRUE)
    model.OU.BM <- MixedGaussian(
  k = nrow(X), 
  modelTypes = MGPMDefaultModelTypes(), 
  mapping = c(6, 2), 
  Sigmae_x = Args_MixedGaussian_MGPMDefaultModelTypes(TRUE)$Sigmae_x)

model.OU.BM <- PCMApplyTransformation(model.OU.BM)
model.OU.BM$X0[] <- c(NA, NA, NA)
model.OU.BM$`1`$H[,,1] <- cbind(
  c(.1, -.7, .6), 
  c(1.3, 2.2, -1.4), 
  c(0.8, 0.2, 0.9))
model.OU.BM$`1`$Theta[] <- c(1.3, -.5, .2)
model.OU.BM$`1`$Sigma_x[,,1] <- cbind(
  c(1, 0, 0), 
  c(1.0, 0.5, 0), 
  c(0.3, -.8, 1))

model.OU.BM$`2`$Sigma_x[,,1] <- cbind(
  c(0.8, 0, 0), 
  c(1, 0.3, 0), 
  c(0.4, 0.5, 0.3))

print(
  PCMTable(model.OU.BM, removeUntransformed = FALSE), 
  xtable = TRUE, type=tableOutputType)


    regime type \(X0\) \(H\) \(\Theta\) \(\Sigma_{u}\) \(\Sigma\)
    :global: NA \(\begin{bmatrix}{} . \\ . \\ . \\ \end{bmatrix}\)
    1 F \(\begin{bmatrix}{} 0.10 & 1.30 & 0.80 \\ -0.70 & 2.20 & 0.20 \\ 0.60 & -1.40 & 0.90 \\ \end{bmatrix}\) \(\begin{bmatrix}{} 1.30 \\ -0.50 \\ 0.20 \\ \end{bmatrix}\) \(\begin{bmatrix}{} 1.00 & 1.00 & 0.30 \\ 0.00 & 0.50 & -0.80 \\ 0.00 & 0.00 & 1.00 \\ \end{bmatrix}\) \(\begin{bmatrix}{} 2.09 & 0.26 & 0.30 \\ 0.26 & 0.89 & -0.80 \\ 0.30 & -0.80 & 1.00 \\ \end{bmatrix}\)
    2 B \(\begin{bmatrix}{} 0.80 & 1.00 & 0.40 \\ 0.00 & 0.30 & 0.50 \\ 0.00 & 0.00 & 0.30 \\ \end{bmatrix}\) \(\begin{bmatrix}{} 1.80 & 0.50 & 0.12 \\ 0.50 & 0.34 & 0.15 \\ 0.12 & 0.15 & 0.09 \\ \end{bmatrix}\) 
    options(digits=4)
print(PCMLik(X[, tree$tip.label], tree, model.OU.BM))
    ## [1] -11.92
## attr(,"X0")
## [1]  9.566 -6.349 15.254

    A tree with five tips and two evolutionary regimes

    traceTable <- PCMLikTrace(X[, tree$tip.label], tree, model.OU.BM)
traceTable[, node:=.I]
setkey(traceTable, i)
pOrder <- c(PCMTreeGetLabels(tree)[tree$edge[PCMTreePostorder(tree), 2]], "0")
options(digits=2)
